anya-e0101n7:2_0: 123. Asubhānantaraṁ uddiṭṭhāsu pana dasasu anussatīsu punappunaṁ uppajjanato satiyeva
anya-e0101n7:2_1: anussati, pavattitabbaṭṭhānamhiyeva vā pavattattā saddhāpabbajitassa kulaputtassa
anya-e0101n7:2_2: anurūpā satītipi anussati, buddhaṁ ārabbha uppannā anussati buddhānussati, buddhaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n7:2_3: satiyā etamadhivacanaṁ. Dhammaṁ ārabbha uppannā anussati dhammānussati, svākkhātatādidhammaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n7:2_4: satiyā etamadhivacanaṁ. Saṅghaṁ ārabbha uppannā anussati saṅghānussati, suppaṭipannatādisaṅghaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n7:2_5: satiyā etamadhivacanaṁ. Sīlaṁ ārabbha uppannā anussati sīlānussati, akhaṇḍatādisīlaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n7:2_6: satiyā etamadhivacanaṁ. Cāgaṁ ārabbha uppannā anussati cāgānussati, muttacāgatādicāgaguṇārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n7:2_7: satiyā etamadhivacanaṁ. Devatā ārabbha uppannā anussati devatānussati, devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n7:2_8: ṭhapetvā attano saddhādiguṇārammaṇāya satiyā etamadhivacanaṁ. Maraṇaṁ ārabbha uppannā
anya-e0101n7:2_9: anussati maraṇānussati, jīvitindriyupacchedārammaṇāya satiyā etamadhivacanaṁ. Kesādibhedaṁ
anya-e0101n7:2_10: rūpakāyaṁ gatā, kāye vā gatāti kāyagatā, kāyagatā ca sā sati cāti kāyagatasatīti
anya-e0101n7:2_11: vattabbe rassaṁ akatvā kāyagatāsatīti vuttā, kesādikāyakoṭṭhāsanimittārammaṇāya satiyā
anya-e0101n7:2_12: etamadhivacanaṁ. Ānāpāne ārabbha uppannā sati ānāpānassati, assāsapassāsanimittārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n7:2_13: satiyā etamadhivacanaṁ. Upasamaṁ ārabbha uppannā anussati upasamānussati, sabbadukkhūpasamārammaṇāya
anya-e0101n7:3_0: 124. Iti imāsu dasasu anussatīsu buddhānussatiṁ tāva bhāvetukāmena aveccappasādasamannāgatena
anya-e0101n7:3_1: yoginā patirūpasenāsane rahogatena paṭisallīnena “itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho
anya-e0101n7:3_2: vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ
anya-e0101n7:3_3: buddho bhagavā”ti evaṁ buddhassa bhagavato guṇā anussaritabbā.

anya-e0101n7:5_0: 125. Tattha ārakattā arīnaṁ arānañca hatattā paccayādīnaṁ arahattā pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti

anya-e0101n7:12_4: saṅkhārānaṁ paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave saṅkhārā kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccayā
anya-e0101n7:12_5: honti, esa nayo itaresu. Kāmabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇaṁ kāmabhave nāmarūpassa paccayo
anya-e0101n7:12_6: hoti, tathā rūpabhave. Arūpabhave nāmasseva paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave nāmarūpaṁ kāmabhave
anya-e0101n7:12_7: saḷāyatanassa paccayo hoti, rūpabhave nāmarūpaṁ rūpabhave tiṇṇaṁ āyatanānaṁ paccayo
anya-e0101n7:12_8: hoti, arūpabhave nāmaṁ arūpabhave ekassa āyatanassa paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave saḷāyatanaṁ
anya-e0101n7:12_9: kāmabhave chabbidhassa phassassa paccayo hoti, rūpabhave tīṇi āyatanāni rūpabhave
anya-e0101n7:12_10: tiṇṇaṁ phassānaṁ paccayā honti, arūpabhave ekaṁ āyatanaṁ arūpabhave ekassa phassassa
anya-e0101n7:12_11: paccayo hoti. Kāmabhave cha phassā kāmabhave channaṁ vedanānaṁ paccayā honti, rūpabhave
anya-e0101n7:12_12: tayo phassā tattheva tissannaṁ, arūpabhave eko tattheva ekissā vedanāya paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n7:12_13: Kāmabhave cha vedanā kāmabhave channaṁ taṇhākāyānaṁ paccayā honti, rūpabhave tisso
anya-e0101n7:12_14: tattheva tiṇṇaṁ, arūpabhave ekā vedanā arūpabhave ekassa taṇhākāyassa paccayo hoti.
anya-e0101n7:12_15: Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhā tassa tassa upādānassa, upādānādayo bhavādīnaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:13_0: Kathaṁ? Idhekacco kāme paribhuñjissāmīti kāmupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṁ carati,
anya-e0101n7:13_1: vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati, duccaritapāripūriyā apāye upapajjati.
anya-e0101n7:13_2: Tatthassa upapattihetubhūtaṁ kammaṁ kammabhavo, kammanibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo,
anya-e0101n7:13_3: khandhānaṁ nibbatti jāti, paripāko jarā, bhedo maraṇaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:14: Aparo saggasampattiṁ anubhavissāmīti tatheva sucaritaṁ carati, sucaritapāripūriyā sagge upapajjati. Tatthassa upapattihetubhūtaṁ kammaṁ kammabhavoti so eva nayo.
anya-e0101n7:15_0: Aparo pana brahmalokasampattiṁ anubhavissāmīti kāmupādānapaccayāeva mettaṁ bhāveti,
anya-e0101n7:15_1: karuṇaṁ, muditaṁ, upekkhaṁ bhāveti, bhāvanāpāripūriyā brahmaloke nibbattati. Tatthassa
anya-e0101n7:15_2: nibbattihetubhūtaṁ kammaṁ kammabhavoti so eva nayo.
anya-e0101n7:16_0: Aparo arūpabhave sampattiṁ anubhavissāmīti tatheva ākāsānañcāyatanādisamāpattiyo
anya-e0101n7:16_1: bhāveti, bhāvanāpāripūriyā tattha tattha nibbattati. Tatthassa nibbattihetubhūtaṁ
anya-e0101n7:16_2: kammaṁ kammabhavo, kammanibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo, khandhānaṁ nibbatti jāti,
anya-e0101n7:16_3: paripāko jarā, bhedo maraṇanti. Esa nayo sesupādānamūlikāsupi yojanāsu.

anya-e0101n7:17_2: hetusamuppannā, ubhopete hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti
anya-e0101n7:18_0: Tattha avijjāsaṅkhārā eko saṅkhepo, viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā eko, taṇhupādānabhavā
anya-e0101n7:18_1: eko, jātijarāmaraṇaṁ eko. Purimasaṅkhepo cettha atīto addhā, dve majjhimā paccuppanno,
anya-e0101n7:18_2: jātijarāmaraṇaṁ anāgato. Avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇena cettha taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva
anya-e0101n7:18_3: hontīti ime pañca dhammā atīte kammavaṭṭaṁ, viññāṇādayo pañca etarahi vipākavaṭṭaṁ,
anya-e0101n7:18_4: taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāva hontīti ime pañca dhammā etarahi
anya-e0101n7:18_5: kammavaṭṭaṁ, jātijarāmaraṇāpadesena viññāṇādīnaṁ niddiṭṭhattā ime pañca dhammā āyatiṁ
anya-e0101n7:18_6: vipākavaṭṭaṁ. Te ākārato vīsatividhā honti. Saṅkhāraviññāṇānañcettha antarā eko sandhi,
anya-e0101n7:18_7: vedanātaṇhānamantarā eko, bhavajātīnamantarā ekoti, iti bhagavā etaṁ catusaṅkhepaṁ
anya-e0101n7:18_8: tiyaddhaṁ vīsatākāraṁ tisandhiṁ paṭiccasamuppādaṁ sabbākārato jānāti passati aññāti
anya-e0101n7:18_9: paṭivijjhati. Taṁ ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇaṁ, pajānanaṭṭhena paññā, tena vuccati paccayapariggahe
anya-e0101n7:18_10: paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti. Iminā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena bhagavā te dhamme yathābhūtaṁ
anya-e0101n7:18_11: ñatvā tesu nibbindanto virajjanto vimuccanto vuttappakārassa imassa saṁsāracakkassa
anya-e0101n7:18_12: are hani vihani viddhaṁsesi. Evampi arānaṁ hatattā arahaṁ.

anya-e0101n7:33_0: 131. Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṁ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddho. Tathāhi esa sabbadhamme
anya-e0101n7:33_1: sammā sāmañca buddho, abhiññeyye dhamme abhiññeyyato buddho, pariññeyye dhamme pariññeyyato,
anya-e0101n7:33_2: pahātabbe dhamme pahātabbato, sacchikātabbe dhamme sacchikātabbato, bhāvetabbe dhamme
anya-e0101n7:35: Pahātabbaṁ pahīnaṁ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇāti. ;
anya-e0101n7:36_0: 132. Apica cakkhuṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, tassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā
anya-e0101n7:36_1: samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnaṁ appavatti nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhapajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccanti
anya-e0101n7:36_2: evaṁ ekekapaduddhārenāpi sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho, esa nayo sotaghānajivhākāyamanesu.
anya-e0101n7:36_3: Eteneva nayena rūpādīni cha āyatanāni, cakkhuviññāṇādayo chaviññāṇakāyā, cakkhusamphassādayo
anya-e0101n7:36_4: cha phassā, cakkhusamphassajādayo cha vedanā, rūpasaññādayo cha saññā, rūpasañcetanādayo
anya-e0101n7:36_5: cha cetanā, rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā, rūpavitakkādayo cha vitakkā, rūpavicārādayo
anya-e0101n7:36_6: cha vicārā, rūpakkhandhādayo pañcakkhandhā, dasa kasiṇāni, dasa anussatiyo, uddhumātakasaññādivasena
anya-e0101n7:36_7: dasa saññā, kesādayo dvattiṁsākārā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, kāmabhavādayo
anya-e0101n7:36_8: nava bhavā, paṭhamādīni cattāri jhānāni, mettābhāvanādayo catasso appamaññā, catasso
anya-e0101n7:36_9: arūpasamāpattiyo, paṭilomato jarāmaraṇādīni, anulomato avijjādīni paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni ca yojetabbāni.
anya-e0101n7:37_0: Tatrāyaṁ ekapadayojanā, jarāmaraṇaṁ dukkhasaccaṁ, jāti samudayasaccaṁ, ubhinnampi
anya-e0101n7:37_1: nissaraṇaṁ nirodhasaccaṁ, nirodhapajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccanti evamekekapaduddhārena
anya-e0101n7:37_2: sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho anubuddho paṭibuddho. Tena vuttaṁ – “sammā sāmañca
anya-e0101n7:38_0: 133. Vijjāhi pana caraṇena ca sampannattā vijjācaraṇasampanno. Tattha vijjāti tissopi
anya-e0101n7:38_1: vijjā aṭṭhapi vijjā. Tisso vijjā bhayabheravasutte vuttanayeneva veditabbā, aṭṭha
anya-e0101n7:38_2: ambaṭṭhasutte. Tatra hi vipassanāñāṇena manomayiddhiyā ca saha cha abhiññā pariggahetvā
anya-e0101n7:38_3: aṭṭha vijjā vuttā. Caraṇanti sīlasaṁvaro, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā,
anya-e0101n7:38_4: jāgariyānuyogo, satta saddhammā, cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānānīti ime pannarasa dhammā
anya-e0101n7:38_5: veditabbā. Imeyeva hi pannarasa dhammā yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṁ
anya-e0101n7:38_6: disaṁ, tasmā caraṇanti vuttā. Yathāha – “idha, mahānāma, ariyasāvako sīlavā hotī”ti
anya-e0101n7:38_7: sabbaṁ majjhimapaṇṇāsake vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Bhagavā imāhi vijjāhi iminā ca
anya-e0101n7:39_0: Tattha vijjāsampadā bhagavato sabbaññutaṁ pūretvā ṭhitā. Caraṇasampadā mahākāruṇikataṁ.
anya-e0101n7:39_1: So sabbaññutāya sabbasattānaṁ atthānatthaṁ ñatvā mahākāruṇikatāya anatthaṁ parivajjetvā
anya-e0101n7:39_2: atthe niyojeti. Yathā taṁ vijjācaraṇasampanno. Tenassa sāvakā suppaṭipannā honti,
anya-e0101n7:39_3: no duppaṭipannā vijjācaraṇavipannānaṁ sāvakā attantapādayo viya.
anya-e0101n7:40_0: 134. Sobhanagamanattā, sundaraṁ ṭhānaṁ gatattā, sammā gatattā, sammā ca gadattā sugato.
anya-e0101n7:40_1: Gamanampi hi gatanti vuccati. Tañca bhagavato sobhanaṁ parisuddhamanavajjaṁ. Kiṁ
anya-e0101n7:40_2: pana tanti? Ariyamaggo. Tena hesa gamanena khemaṁ disaṁ asajjamāno gatoti sobhanagamanattā
anya-e0101n7:40_3: sugato. Sundarañcesa ṭhānaṁ gato amataṁ nibbānanti sundaraṁ ṭhānaṁ gatattāpi sugato.
anya-e0101n7:40_4: Sammā ca gato tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto. Vuttañhetaṁ –
anya-e0101n7:40_5: “sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti
anya-e0101n7:40_6: sugato…pe… arahattamaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti
anya-e0101n7:40_7: sugato”ti, sammā vā gato dīpaṅkarapādamūlato pabhuti yāva bodhimaṇḍā tāva samatiṁsapāramīpūrikāya
anya-e0101n7:40_8: sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karonto sassataṁ, ucchedaṁ, kāmasukhaṁ,
anya-e0101n7:40_9: attakilamathanti ime ca ante anupagacchanto gatoti sammā gatattāpi sugato. Sammā
anya-e0101n7:40_10: cesa gadati yuttaṭṭhāne yuttameva vācaṁ bhāsatīti sammā gadattāpi sugato. Tatridaṁ
anya-e0101n7:40_11: sādhakasuttaṁ “yaṁ tathāgato vācaṁ jānāti abhūtaṁ atacchaṁ anatthasañhitaṁ, sā ca
anya-e0101n7:40_12: paresaṁ appiyā amanāpā, na taṁ tathāgato vācaṁ bhāsati. Yampi tathāgato vācaṁ jānāti
anya-e0101n7:40_13: bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ anatthasañhitaṁ, sā ca paresaṁ appiyā amanāpā, tampi tathāgato vācaṁ
anya-e0101n7:40_14: na bhāsati. Yañca kho tathāgato vācaṁ jānāti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasañhitaṁ, sā ca
anya-e0101n7:40_15: paresaṁ appiyā amanāpā, tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāya.
anya-e0101n7:40_16: Yaṁ tathāgato vācaṁ jānāti abhūtaṁ atacchaṁ anatthasañhitaṁ, sā ca paresaṁ piyā manāpā,
anya-e0101n7:40_17: na taṁ tathāgato vācaṁ bhāsati. Yampi tathāgato vācaṁ jānāti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ anatthasañhitaṁ,
anya-e0101n7:40_18: sā ca paresaṁ piyā manāpā, tampi tathāgato vācaṁ na bhāsati. Yañca kho tathāgato
anya-e0101n7:40_19: vācaṁ jānāti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ atthasañhitaṁ, sā ca paresaṁ piyā manāpā, tatra kālaññū
anya-e0101n7:40_20: tathāgato hoti tassā vācāya veyyākaraṇāyā”ti. Evaṁ sammā gadattāpi sugatoti veditabbo.
anya-e0101n7:41_0: 135. Sabbathāpi viditalokattā pana lokavidū. So hi bhagavā sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato
anya-e0101n7:41_1: nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathā lokaṁ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi. Yathāha – “yattha kho, āvuso,
anya-e0101n7:41_2: na jāyati na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, nāhaṁ taṁ gamanena lokassa
anya-e0101n7:41_3: antaṁ ñāteyyaṁ daṭṭheyyaṁ patteyyanti vadāmi, na cāhaṁ, āvuso, apatvāva lokassa antaṁ
anya-e0101n7:41_4: dukkhassa antakiriyaṁ vadāmi. Api cāhaṁ, āvuso, imasmiññeva byāmamatte kaḷevare sasaññimhi
anya-e0101n7:41_5: samanake lokañca paññapemi lokasamudayañca lokanirodhañca lokanirodhagāminiñca paṭipadaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:43: Na ca apatvā lokantaṁ, dukkhā atthi pamocanaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:48_0: 136. Apica tayo lokā saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti. Tattha eko loko sabbe sattā
anya-e0101n7:48_1: āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo. Sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti

anya-e0101n7:137_0: 148.Sandiṭṭhikoti ettha pana ariyamaggo tāva attano santāne rāgādīnaṁ abhāvaṁ karontena
anya-e0101n7:137_1: ariyapuggalena sāmaṁ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko. Yathāha –“ratto kho, brāhmaṇa, rāgena
anya-e0101n7:137_2: abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto attabyābādhāyapi ceteti, parabyābādhāyapi ceteti, ubhayabyābādhāyapi
anya-e0101n7:137_3: ceteti. Cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti. Rāge pahīne neva attabyābādhāya
anya-e0101n7:137_4: ceteti, na parabyābādhāya ceteti, na ubhayabyābādhāya ceteti, na cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ
anya-e0101n7:137_5: domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti. Evampi kho, brāhmaṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hotī”ti. Apica
anya-e0101n7:137_6: navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo yena yena adhigato hoti, tena tena parasaddhāya gantabbataṁ
anya-e0101n7:137_7: hitvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena sayaṁ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko. Atha vā pasatthā diṭṭhi
anya-e0101n7:137_8: sandiṭṭhi, sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti sandiṭṭhiko. Tathā hettha ariyamaggo sampayuttāya,
anya-e0101n7:137_9: ariyaphalaṁ kāraṇabhūtāya, nibbānaṁ visayibhūtāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayati. Tasmā
anya-e0101n7:137_10: yathā rathena jayatīti rathiko, evaṁ navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti sandiṭṭhiko.
anya-e0101n7:138_0: Atha vā diṭṭhanti dassanaṁ vuccati. Diṭṭhameva sandiṭṭhaṁ, dassananti attho. Sandiṭṭhaṁ
anya-e0101n7:138_1: arahatīti sandiṭṭhiko. Lokuttaradhammo hi bhāvanābhisamayavasena sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena
anya-e0101n7:138_2: ca dissamānoyeva vaṭṭabhayaṁ nivatteti. Tasmā yathā vatthaṁ arahatīti vatthiko, evaṁ
anya-e0101n7:139_0: 149. Attano phaladānaṁ sandhāya nāssa kāloti akālo. Akāloyeva akāliko. Na pañcāhasattāhādibhedaṁ
anya-e0101n7:139_1: kālaṁ khepetvā phalaṁ deti, attano pana pavattisamanantarameva phaladoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:139_2: Atha vā attano phaladāne pakaṭṭho kālo patto assāti kāliko. Ko so? Lokiyo kusaladhammo.
anya-e0101n7:139_3: Ayaṁ pana samanantaraphalattā na kālikoti akāliko. Idaṁ maggameva sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:140_0: 150. “Ehi passa imaṁ dhamma”nti evaṁ pavattaṁ ehipassavidhiṁ arahatīti ehipassiko.
anya-e0101n7:140_1: Kasmā panesa taṁ vidhiṁ arahatīti? Vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca. Rittamuṭṭhiyaṁ
anya-e0101n7:140_2: hi hiraññaṁ vā suvaṇṇaṁ vā atthīti vatvāpi “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṁ. Kasmā?
anya-e0101n7:140_3: Avijjamānattā. Vijjamānampi ca gūthaṁ vā muttaṁ vā manuññabhāvappakāsanena cittasampahaṁsanatthaṁ
anya-e0101n7:140_4: “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṁ. Apica kho pana tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā paṭicchādetabbameva
anya-e0101n7:140_5: hoti. Kasmā? Aparisuddhattā. Ayaṁ pana navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sabhāvatova vijjamāno
anya-e0101n7:140_6: vigatavalāhake ākāse sampuṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṁ viya paṇḍukambale nikkhittajātimaṇi viya
anya-e0101n7:140_7: ca parisuddho. Tasmā vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca ehipassavidhiṁ arahatīti ehipassiko.
anya-e0101n7:141_0: 151. Upanetabboti opaneyyiko. Ayaṁ panettha vinicchayo, upanayanaṁ upanayo, ādittaṁ
anya-e0101n7:141_1: celaṁ vā sīsaṁ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi bhāvanāvasena attano citte upanayanaṁ arahatīti
anya-e0101n7:141_2: opanayiko. Opanayikova opaneyyiko. Idaṁ saṅkhate lokuttaradhamme yujjati. Asaṅkhate
anya-e0101n7:141_3: pana attano cittena upanayanaṁ arahatīti opaneyyiko. Sacchikiriyāvasena allīyanaṁ arahatīti attho.
anya-e0101n7:142: Atha vā nibbānaṁ upanetīti ariyamaggo upaneyyo. Sacchikātabbataṁ upanetabboti phalanibbānadhammo upaneyyo. Upaneyyo eva opaneyyiko.
anya-e0101n7:143_0: 152.Paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhīti sabbehipi ugghaṭitaññūādīhi viññūhi attani attani
anya-e0101n7:143_1: veditabbo “bhāvito me maggo, adhigataṁ phalaṁ, sacchikato nirodho”ti. Na hi upajjhāyena
anya-e0101n7:143_2: bhāvitena maggena saddhivihārikassa kilesā pahīyanti, na so tassa phalasamāpattiyā
anya-e0101n7:143_3: phāsuviharati, na tena sacchikataṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti. Tasmā na esa parassa sīse
anya-e0101n7:143_4: ābharaṇaṁ viya daṭṭhabbo, attano pana citteyeva daṭṭhabbo, anubhavitabbo viññūhīti
anya-e0101n7:143_5: vuttaṁ hoti. Bālānaṁ pana avisayo cesa.
anya-e0101n7:144: Apica svākkhāto ayaṁ dhammo. Kasmā? Sandiṭṭhikattā. Sandiṭṭhiko, akālikattā. Akāliko, ehipassikattā. Yo ca ehipassiko, so nāma opaneyyiko hotīti.
anya-e0101n7:145_0: 153. Tassevaṁ svākkhātatādibhede dhammaguṇe anussarato neva tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ
anya-e0101n7:145_1: cittaṁ hoti. Na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti. Ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ
anya-e0101n7:145_2: samaye cittaṁ hoti dhammaṁ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe
anya-e0101n7:145_3: jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Dhammaguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya
anya-e0101n7:145_4: vā appanaṁ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṁ hoti. Tadetaṁ dhammaguṇānussaraṇavasena
anya-e0101n7:146_0: Imañca pana dhammānussatiṁ anuyutto bhikkhu evaṁ opaneyyikassa dhammassa desetāraṁ
anya-e0101n7:146_1: imināpaṅgena samannāgataṁ satthāraṁ neva atītaṁse samanupassāmi, na panetarahi aññatra
anya-e0101n7:146_2: tena bhagavatāti evaṁ dhammaguṇadassaneneva satthari sagāravo hoti sappatisso. Dhamme
anya-e0101n7:146_3: garucittīkāro saddhādivepullaṁ adhigacchati, pītipāmojjabahulo hoti, bhayabheravasaho,
anya-e0101n7:146_5: ajjhāvutthañcassa sarīrampi cetiyagharamiva pūjārahaṁ hoti, anuttaradhammādhigamāya
anya-e0101n7:146_6: cittaṁ namati, vītikkamitabbavatthusamāyoge cassa dhammasudhammataṁ samanussarato
anya-e0101n7:146_7: hirottappaṁ paccupaṭṭhāti. Uttari appaṭivijjhanto pana sugatiparāyano hoti.
anya-e0101n7:151_1: sāvakasaṅgho, ujuppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, ñāyappaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho,
anya-e0101n7:151_2: sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, yadidaṁ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā,
anya-e0101n7:151_3: esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo, pāhuneyyo, dakkhiṇeyyo, añjalikaraṇīyo, anuttaraṁ
anya-e0101n7:152_0: 155. Tattha suppaṭipannoti suṭṭhu paṭipanno, sammāpaṭipadaṁ anivattipaṭipadaṁ anulomapaṭipadaṁ
anya-e0101n7:152_1: apaccanīkapaṭipadaṁ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṁ paṭipannoti vuttaṁ hoti. Bhagavato ovādānusāsaniṁ
anya-e0101n7:152_2: sakkaccaṁ suṇantīti sāvakā. Sāvakānaṁ saṅgho sāvakasaṅgho, sīladiṭṭhisāmaññatāya
anya-e0101n7:152_3: saṅghātabhāvamāpanno sāvakasamūhoti attho. Yasmā pana sā sammāpaṭipadā uju avaṅkā
anya-e0101n7:152_4: akuṭilā ajimhā, ariyo ca ñāyotipi vuccati, anucchavikattā ca sāmīcītipi saṅkhaṁ gatā.
anya-e0101n7:152_5: Tasmā tampaṭipanno ariyasaṅgho ujuppaṭipanno ñāyappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipannotipi vutto.
anya-e0101n7:153: Ettha ca ye maggaṭṭhā, te sammāpaṭipattisamaṅgitāya suppaṭipannā. Ye phalaṭṭhā, te sammāpaṭipadāya adhigantabbassa adhigatattā atītaṁ paṭipadaṁ sandhāya suppaṭipannāti veditabbā.
anya-e0101n7:154: Apica svākkhāte dhammavinaye yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipannattāpi apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṁ paṭipannattāpi suppaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n7:155: Majjhimāya paṭipadāya antadvayamanupagamma paṭipannattā kāyavacīmanovaṅkakuṭilajimhadosappahānāya paṭipannattā ca ujuppaṭipannattā ca ujuppaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n7:156: Ñāyo vuccati nibbānaṁ. Tadatthāya paṭipannattā ñāyappaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n7:157: Yathā paṭipannā sāmīcippaṭipannārahā honti, tathā paṭipannattā sāmīcippaṭipanno.
anya-e0101n7:158_0: 156.Yadidanti yāni imāni. Cattāri purisayugānīti yugaḷavasena paṭhamamaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti
anya-e0101n7:158_1: idamekaṁ yugaḷanti evaṁ cattāri purisayugaḷāni honti. Aṭṭha purisapuggalāti purisapuggalavasena
anya-e0101n7:158_2: eko paṭhamamaggaṭṭho eko phalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭheva purisapuggalā honti. Ettha
anya-e0101n7:158_3: ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthāni etāni padāni. Veneyyavasena panetaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:158_4: Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅghoti yānimāni yugavasena cattāri purisayugāni, pāṭiekkato
anya-e0101n7:158_5: aṭṭha purisapuggalā, esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho, āhuneyyotiādīsu ānetvā hunitabbanti
anya-e0101n7:158_6: āhunaṁ, dūratopi ānetvā sīlavantesu dātabbanti attho. Catunnaṁ paccayānametamadhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:158_7: Taṁ āhunaṁ paṭiggahetuṁ yutto tassa mahapphalakaraṇatoti āhuneyyo. Atha vā dūratopi
anya-e0101n7:158_8: āgantvā sabbasāpateyyampi ettha hunitabbanti āhavanīyo. Sakkādīnampi vā āhavanaṁ
anya-e0101n7:158_9: arahatīti āhavanīyo. Yo cāyaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ āhavanīyo nāma aggi, yattha hutaṁ mahapphalanti
anya-e0101n7:158_10: tesaṁ laddhi. Sace hutassa mahapphalatāya āhavanīyo, saṅghova āhavanīyo. Saṅghe hutañhi
anya-e0101n7:159: “Yo ca vassasataṁ jantu, aggiṁ paricare vane;
anya-e0101n7:161: Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṁ huta”nti. ;
anya-e0101n7:162: Tadetaṁ nikāyantare āhavanīyoti padaṁ idha āhuneyyoti iminā padena atthato ekaṁ. Byañjanato panettha kiñcimattameva nānaṁ. Iti āhuneyyo.
anya-e0101n7:163_0: Pāhuneyyoti ettha pana pāhunaṁ vuccati disāvidisato āgatānaṁ piyamanāpānaṁ ñātimittānamatthāya
anya-e0101n7:163_1: sakkārena paṭiyattaṁ āgantukadānaṁ. Tampi ṭhapetvā te tathārūpe pāhunake saṅghasseva
anya-e0101n7:163_2: dātuṁ yuttaṁ, saṅghova taṁ paṭiggahetuṁ yutto. Saṅghasadiso hi pāhunako natthi. Tathā
anya-e0101n7:163_3: hesa ekabuddhantare ca dissati, abbokiṇṇañca piyamanāpattakarehi dhammehi samannāgatoti.
anya-e0101n7:163_4: Evaṁ pāhunamassa dātuṁ yuttaṁ pāhunañca paṭiggahetuṁ yuttoti pāhuneyyo. Yesaṁ pana
anya-e0101n7:163_5: pāhavanīyoti pāḷi, tesaṁ yasmā saṅgho pubbakāramarahati, tasmā sabbapaṭhamaṁ ānetvā
anya-e0101n7:163_6: ettha hunitabbanti pāhavanīyo. Sabbappakārena vā āhavanamarahatīti pāhavanīyo. Svāyamidha
anya-e0101n7:164: Dakkhiṇāti pana paralokaṁ saddahitvā dātabbadānaṁ vuccati. Taṁ dakkhiṇaṁ arahati, dakkhiṇāya vā hito yasmā naṁ mahapphalakaraṇatāya visodhetīti dakkhiṇeyyo.
anya-e0101n7:165: Ubho hatthe sirasmiṁ patiṭṭhapetvā sabbalokena kayiramānaṁ añjalikammaṁ arahatīti añjalikaraṇīyo.
anya-e0101n7:166_0: Anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassāti sabbalokassa asadisaṁ puññavirūhanaṭṭhānaṁ. Yathā
anya-e0101n7:166_1: hi rañño vā amaccassa vā sālīnaṁ vā yavānaṁ vā virūhanaṭṭhānaṁ rañño sālikkhettaṁ
anya-e0101n7:166_2: rañño yavakkhettanti vuccati, evaṁ saṅgho sabbalokassa puññānaṁ virūhanaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:166_3: Saṅghaṁ nissāya hi lokassa nānappakārahitasukhasaṁvattanikāni puññāni virūhanti.

anya-e0101n7:173_0: 158. Sīlānussatiṁ bhāvetukāmena pana rahogatena paṭisallīnena “aho vata me sīlāni
anya-e0101n7:173_1: akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni
anya-e0101n7:173_2: samādhisaṁvattanikānī”ti evaṁ akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena attano sīlāni anussaritabbāni.
anya-e0101n7:173_3: Tāni ca gahaṭṭhena gahaṭṭhasīlāni, pabbajitena pabbajitasīlāni.
anya-e0101n7:174_0: Gahaṭṭhasīlāni vā hontu pabbajitasīlāni vā, yesaṁ ādimhi vā ante vā ekampi na bhinnaṁ,
anya-e0101n7:174_1: tāni pariyante chinnasāṭako viya na khaṇḍānīti akhaṇḍāni. Yesaṁ vemajjhe ekampi na
anya-e0101n7:174_2: bhinnaṁ, tāni majjhe vinividdhasāṭako viya na chiddānīti acchiddāni. Yesaṁ paṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0101n7:174_3: dve vā tīṇi vā na bhinnāni, tāni piṭṭhiyā vā kucchiyā vā uṭṭhitena dīghavaṭṭādisaṇṭhānena
anya-e0101n7:174_4: visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṁ aññatarasarīravaṇṇā gāvī viya na sabalānīti asabalāni.
anya-e0101n7:174_5: Yāni antarantarā na bhinnāni, tāni visabhāgabinduvicitrā gāvī viya na kammāsānīti
anya-e0101n7:174_6: akammāsāni. Avisesena vā sabbānipi sattavidhena methunasaṁyogena kodhupanāhādīhi
anya-e0101n7:174_7: ca pāpadhammehi anupahatattā akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni. Tāniyeva
anya-e0101n7:174_8: taṇhādāsabyato mocetvā bhujissabhāvakaraṇena bhujissāni. Buddhādīhi viññūhi pasatthattā
anya-e0101n7:174_9: viññuppasatthāni. Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi aparāmaṭṭhatāya kenaci vā ayaṁ te sīlesu dosoti evaṁ
anya-e0101n7:174_10: parāmaṭṭhuṁ asakkuṇeyyatāya aparāmaṭṭhāni. Upacārasamādhiṁ appanāsamādhiṁ vā, atha
anya-e0101n7:174_11: vā pana maggasamādhiṁ phalasamādhiñcāpi saṁvattentīti samādhisaṁvattanikāni.

anya-e0101n7:181_0: 160. Cāgānussatiṁ bhāvetukāmena pana pakatiyā cāgādhimuttena niccappavattadānasaṁvibhāgena
anya-e0101n7:181_1: bhavitabbaṁ. Atha vā pana bhāvanaṁ ārabhantena ito dāni pabhuti sati paṭiggāhake
anya-e0101n7:181_2: antamaso ekālopamattampi dānaṁ adatvā na bhuñjissāmīti samādānaṁ katvā taṁdivasaṁ
anya-e0101n7:181_3: guṇavisiṭṭhesu paṭiggāhakesu yathāsatti yathābalaṁ dānaṁ datvā tattha nimittaṁ gaṇhitvā
anya-e0101n7:181_4: rahogatena paṭisallīnena “lābhā vata me suladdhaṁ vata me, yohaṁ maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitāya
anya-e0101n7:181_5: pajāya vigatamalamaccherena cetasā viharāmi muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo
anya-e0101n7:181_6: dānasaṁvibhāgarato”ti evaṁ vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasena attano cāgo anussaritabbo.
anya-e0101n7:182_0: Tattha lābhā vata meti mayhaṁ vata lābhā, ye ime “āyuṁ kho pana datvā āyussa bhāgī
anya-e0101n7:182_1: hoti dibbassa vā mānusassa vā” iti ca, “dadaṁ piyo hoti bhajanti naṁ bahū” iti ca,
anya-e0101n7:182_2: “dadamāno piyo hoti, sataṁ dhammaṁ anukkamaṁ” iti ca evamādīhi nayehi bhagavatā dāyakassa
anya-e0101n7:182_3: lābhā saṁvaṇṇitā, te mayhaṁ avassaṁ bhāginoti adhippāyo. Suladdhaṁ vata meti yaṁ
anya-e0101n7:182_4: mayā idaṁ sāsanaṁ manussattaṁ vā laddhaṁ, taṁ suladdhaṁ vata me. Kasmā ? Yohaṁ maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitāya
anya-e0101n7:183_0: Tattha maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitāyāti maccheramalena abhibhūtāya. Pajāyāti pajāyanavasena
anya-e0101n7:183_1: sattā vuccanti. Tasmā attano sampattīnaṁ parasādhāraṇabhāvamasahanalakkhaṇena cittassa
anya-e0101n7:183_2: pabhassarabhāvadūsakānaṁ kaṇhadhammānaṁ aññatarena maccheramalena abhibhūtesu sattesūti
anya-e0101n7:183_3: ayamettha attho. Vigatamalamaccherenāti aññesampi rāgadosādimalānañceva maccherassa
anya-e0101n7:183_4: ca vigatattā vigatamalamaccherena. Cetasā viharāmīti yathāvuttappakāracitto hutvā
anya-e0101n7:183_5: vasāmīti attho. Suttesu pana mahānāmasakkassa sotāpannassa sato nissayavihāraṁ pucchato
anya-e0101n7:183_6: nissayavihāravasena desitattā agāraṁ ajjhāvasāmīti vuttaṁ. Tattha abhibhavitvā vasāmīti attho.
anya-e0101n7:184_0: Muttacāgoti vissaṭṭhacāgo. Payatapāṇīti parisuddhahattho. Sakkaccaṁ sahatthā deyyadhammaṁ
anya-e0101n7:184_1: dātuṁ sadā dhotahatthoyevāti vuttaṁ hoti. Vossaggaratoti vossajjanaṁ vossaggo, pariccāgoti
anya-e0101n7:184_2: attho. Tasmiṁ vossagge satatābhiyogavasena ratoti vossaggarato. Yācayogoti yaṁ yaṁ
anya-e0101n7:184_3: pare yācanti, tassa tassa dānato yācanayogoti attho. Yājayogotipi pāṭho. Yajanasaṅkhātena
anya-e0101n7:184_4: yājena yuttoti attho. Dānasaṁvibhāgaratoti dāne ca saṁvibhāge ca rato. Ahañhi dānañca
anya-e0101n7:184_5: demi, attanā paribhuñjitabbatopi ca saṁvibhāgaṁ karomi, ettheva casmi ubhaye ratoti
anya-e0101n7:185_0: 161. Tassevaṁ vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasena attano cāgaṁ anussarato neva tasmiṁ
anya-e0101n7:185_1: samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti. Na dosa…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti.
anya-e0101n7:185_2: Ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti cāgaṁ ārabbhāti purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa
anya-e0101n7:185_3: ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Cāgaguṇānaṁ pana gambhīratāya nānappakāracāgaguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya
anya-e0101n7:185_4: vā appanaṁ appatvā upacārappattameva jhānaṁ hoti. Tadetaṁ cāgaguṇānussaraṇavasena
anya-e0101n7:186_0: Imañca pana cāgānussatiṁ anuyutto bhikkhu bhiyyoso mattāya cāgādhimutto hoti, alobhajjhāsayo,
anya-e0101n7:186_1: mettāya anulomakārī, visārado, pītipāmojjabahulo, uttari appaṭivijjhanto pana sugatiparāyano hoti.
anya-e0101n7:191_0: 162. Devatānussatiṁ bhāvetukāmena pana ariyamaggavasena samudāgatehi saddhādīhi guṇehi
anya-e0101n7:191_1: samannāgatena bhavitabbaṁ. Tato rahogatena paṭisallīnena “santi devā cātumahārājikā,
anya-e0101n7:191_2: santi devā tāvatiṁsā, yāmā, tusitā, nimmānaratino, paranimmitavasavattino, santi
anya-e0101n7:191_3: devā brahmakāyikā, santi devā tatuttari, yathārūpāya saddhāya samannāgatā tā devatā
anya-e0101n7:191_4: ito cutā tattha upapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā saṁvijjati. Yathārūpena sīlena.
anya-e0101n7:191_5: Yathārūpena sutena. Yathārūpena cāgena. Yathārūpāya paññāya samannāgatā tā devatā
anya-e0101n7:191_6: ito cutā tattha upapannā, mayhampi tathārūpā paññā saṁvijjatī”ti evaṁ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne
anya-e0101n7:192_0: Sutte pana yasmiṁ mahānāma samaye ariyasāvako attano ca tāsañca devatānaṁ saddhañca
anya-e0101n7:192_1: sīlañca sutañca cāgañca paññañca anussarati, nevassa tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ
anya-e0101n7:192_2: cittaṁ hotīti vuttaṁ. Kiñcāpi vuttaṁ, atha kho taṁ sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbadevatānaṁ
anya-e0101n7:192_3: attano saddhādīhi samānaguṇadīpanatthaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ. Aṭṭhakathāyañhi devatā
anya-e0101n7:192_4: sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇe anussaratīti daḷhaṁ katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:193_0: 163. Tasmā pubbabhāge devatānaṁ guṇe anussaritvā aparabhāge attano saṁvijjamāne saddhādiguṇe
anya-e0101n7:193_1: anussarato cassa neva tasmiṁ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti. Na dosa…pe… na
anya-e0101n7:193_2: mohapariyuṭṭhitaṁ cittaṁ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti devatā ārabbhāti
anya-e0101n7:193_3: purimanayeneva vikkhambhitanīvaraṇassa ekakkhaṇe jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti. Saddhādiguṇānaṁ
anya-e0101n7:193_4: pana gambhīratāya nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāya vā appanaṁ appatvā upacārappattameva
anya-e0101n7:193_5: jhānaṁ hoti. Tadetaṁ devatānaṁ guṇasadisasaddhādiguṇānussaraṇavasena devatānussaticceva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0101n7:194_0: Imañca pana devatānussatiṁ anuyutto bhikkhu devatānaṁ piyo hoti manāpo, bhiyyoso
anya-e0101n7:194_1: mattāya saddhādivepullaṁ adhigacchati, pītipāmojjabahulo viharati. Uttari appaṭivijjhanto
anya-e0101n7:199_0: 164. Yaṁ pana etāsaṁ vitthāradesanāyaṁ “ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti
anya-e0101n7:199_1: tathāgataṁ ārabbhā”tiādīni vatvā “ujugatacitto kho pana, mahānāma, ariyasāvako labhati
anya-e0101n7:199_2: atthavedaṁ, labhati dhammavedaṁ, labhati dhammūpasaṁhitaṁ pāmojjaṁ, pamuditassa pīti
anya-e0101n7:199_3: jāyatī”ti vuttaṁ, tattha itipi so bhagavātiādīnaṁ atthaṁ nissāya uppannaṁ tuṭṭhiṁ
anya-e0101n7:199_4: sandhāya labhati atthavedanti vuttaṁ. Pāḷiṁ nissāya uppannaṁ tuṭṭhiṁ sandhāya labhati
anya-e0101n7:199_5: dhammavedaṁ. Ubhayavasena labhati dhammūpasaṁhitaṁ pāmojjanti vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:200_0: Yañca devatānussatiyaṁ devatā ārabbhāti vuttaṁ, taṁ pubbabhāge devatā ārabbha pavattacittavasena
anya-e0101n7:200_1: devatāguṇasadise vā devatābhāvanipphādake guṇe ārabbha pavattacittavasena vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0101n7:201_0: 165. Imā pana cha anussatiyo ariyasāvakānaññeva ijjhanti. Tesaṁ hi buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇā
anya-e0101n7:201_1: pākaṭā honti. Te ca akhaṇḍatādiguṇehi sīlehi, vigatamalamaccherena cāgena, mahānubhāvānaṁ
anya-e0101n7:201_2: devatānaṁ guṇasadisehi saddhādiguṇehi samannāgatā. Mahānāmasutte ca sotāpannassa
anya-e0101n7:201_3: nissayavihāraṁ puṭṭhena bhagavatā sotāpannassa nissayavihāradassanatthameva etā vitthārato kathitā.
anya-e0101n7:202_0: Gedhasuttepi “idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako tathāgataṁ anussarati, itipi so bhagavā…pe…
anya-e0101n7:202_1: ujugatamevassa tasmiṁ samaye cittaṁ hoti nikkhantaṁ muttaṁ vuṭṭhitaṁ gedhamhā. Gedhoti
anya-e0101n7:202_2: kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṁ kāmaguṇānamadhivacanaṁ. Idampi kho, bhikkhave, ārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0101n7:202_3: karitvā evamidhekacce sattā visujjhantī”ti evaṁ ariyasāvakassa anussativasena cittaṁ
anya-e0101n7:203_0: Āyasmatā mahākaccānena desite sambādhokāsasuttepi “acchariyaṁ, āvuso, abbhutaṁ, āvuso,
anya-e0101n7:203_1: yāvañcidaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sambādhe okāsādhigamo
anya-e0101n7:203_2: anubuddho sattānaṁ visuddhiyā…pe… nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya yadidaṁ cha anussatiṭṭhānāni.
anya-e0101n7:203_3: Katamāni cha? Idhāvuso, ariyasāvako tathāgataṁ anussarati…pe… evamidhekacce sattā
anya-e0101n7:203_4: visuddhidhammā bhavantī”ti evaṁ ariyasāvakasseva paramatthavisuddhidhammatāya okāsādhigamavasena kathitā.
anya-e0101n7:204_0: Uposathasuttepi “kathañca, visākhe, ariyūposatho hoti? Upakkiliṭṭhassa, visākhe,
anya-e0101n7:204_1: cittassa upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti. Kathañca, visākhe, upakkiliṭṭhassa cittassa
anya-e0101n7:204_2: upakkamena pariyodapanā hoti? Idha, visākhe, ariyasāvako tathāgataṁ anussaratī”ti
anya-e0101n7:204_3: evaṁ ariyasāvakasseva uposathaṁ upavasato cittavisodhanakammaṭṭhānavasena uposathassa
anya-e0101n7:205_0: Ekādasanipātepi “saddho kho, mahānāma, ārādhako hoti, no assaddho. Āraddhavīriyo,
anya-e0101n7:205_1: upaṭṭhitasati, samāhito, paññavā, mahānāma, ārādhako hoti, no duppañño. Imesu kho
anya-e0101n7:205_2: tvaṁ, mahānāma, pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cha dhamme uttari bhāveyyāsi. Idha tvaṁ,
anya-e0101n7:205_3: mahānāma, tathāgataṁ anussareyyāsi itipi so bhagavā”ti evaṁ ariyasāvakasseva “tesaṁ
anya-e0101n7:205_4: no, bhante, nānāvihārena viharataṁ kenassa vihārena viharitabba”nti pucchato vihāradassanatthaṁ kathitā.
anya-e0101n7:206_0: 166. Evaṁ santepi parisuddhasīlādiguṇasamannāgatena puthujjanenāpi manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0101n7:206_1: Anussavavasenāpi hi buddhādīnaṁ guṇe anussarato cittaṁ pasīdatiyeva. Yassānubhāvena
anya-e0101n7:206_2: nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā uḷārapāmojjo vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā arahattaṁyeva sacchikareyya
anya-e0101n7:207_0: So kirāyasmā mārena nimmitaṁ buddharūpaṁ disvā “ayaṁ tāva sarāgadosamoho evaṁ sobhati,
anya-e0101n7:207_1: kathaṁ nu kho bhagavā na sobhati, so hi sabbaso vītarāgadosamoho”ti buddhārammaṇaṁ
anya-e0101n7:207_2: pītiṁ paṭilabhitvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇīti.
